nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 47. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Chance Light Rain

Mostly cloudy, with a high near 60. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
